system.description: The Target sheds Light out to Near for the duration. You can choose to do so by creating a floating mote of light that follows the Target.
system.effect: The Target sheds Light out to Near for the duration. You can choose to do so by creating a floating mote of light that follows the Target.
system.critEffect: Beings of your choice within the Light when you Cast the Spell are Blinded (Cd4).
